name: Kingdra
flavorText:
It is said that it
usually hides in
underwater caves. It can create
whirlpools by
yawning.

previous.name: Houndoom
previous.flavorText:
If you are burned
by the flames it
shoots from its mouth, the pain
will never go
away.

next.name: Phanpy
next.flavorText:
It swings its long
snout around play­
fully, but because it is so strong,
that can be dan­
gerous.

pokemon.name: Horsea
pokemon.flavorText:
Known to shoot
down flying bugs
with precision blasts of ink
from the surface
of the water.

pokemon.name: Seadra
pokemon.flavorText:
Capable of swim­
ming backwards by
rapidly flapping its wing-like
pectoral fins and
stout tail.

It is said that it
usually hides in
